title: Software Engineer C++ Libraries (all genders)
content:
Who We Are
For over 25 years, Native Instruments has been at the forefront of sonic innovation. Guided by our mission to inspire and enable creators to express themselves, we develop integrated audio hardware and software solutions for musicians, producers, engineers, and DJs of all genres and levels of experience.
 
Our Infrastructure / Libraries team is responsible for maintaining, improving and expanding our core libraries and frameworks, the platform used in our audio effect plugins and instruments focussing on the Brainworx and Plugin Alliance brands. We are experts in supporting the product and partner teams, providing solutions with clean architecture and continuous improvement in mind. 
 
What You'll Do
Maintain, improve and expand our core libraries and frameworks, the foundation for our audio effect plugins and instruments
Be part of a libraries team that is working in close cooperation with other NI teams
Design and implement while striving towards state-of-the-art architecture and best practices (e.g. DevOps, agile/lean, design patterns, clean code)
Expand know how of various focus areas (cross-platform plugin abstraction frameworks, licensing, and more)
Continuous learning as part of the job
Understand and adapt to the business needs and requirements as needed
 
What You'll Need
Professional experience in cross-platform C++ development (ideally macOS and Windows)
Successful track record of designing new software as well as improving and refactoring older software
Experience with Git/gitflow, build & release pipelines, automated testing
Ideally knowledge of macOS / Windows APIs, scripting languages like PowerShell / Python, configuration as code, TDD, cryptography, ObjC
Good working knowledge of German and English, both written and spoken
 
About Us
Native Instruments embraces diversity and a respect for all people. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer and we believe the foundation of our dynamic and pioneering spirit starts with a fair and inclusive culture. At Native Instruments we value teamwork and passion, deliver inspiring experiences, continuously innovate and empower our communities, while also serving our planet.
 
All applicants will receive equal consideration for employment at Native Instruments and we encourage everyone to apply – regardless of gender identity, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.
 
Help us reach our goal in making the future of music diverse, inclusive and exciting! We encourage you to submit your application without the requirement for a photograph, identifying factors or personal status information.

demographic_questions.header: Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, Belonging, and Accessibility
demographic_questions.description:
At NI, we are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace that values all individuals' unique perspectives and contributions. To further this commitment, we have implemented a policy to ensure that candidates from underrepresented groups, including those related to gender, disability, ethnicity, and sexuality, have equitable opportunities in our hiring process.

If you identify with one or more of these underrepresented groups, please inform us by selecting the appropriate category during the application process, and if you meet the requirements outlined in the job description, you will automatically be considered for the interview.  Your choice to share this information is entirely voluntary and confidential. Your data will not be shared with the hiring manager without your consent.

We remain dedicated to fair and robust interview processes based on standardized criteria to evaluate all applicants objectively. However, we recognize that some individuals may face additional challenges in reaching the initial interview stage, so we have introduced this approach. Our aim is to broaden the diversity of our talent pool, promoting equal opportunities for all.

At NI, diversity and inclusion are at the heart of our values. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply and help us build a workplace that embraces diversity, fosters inclusion, and values the strength of our differences
